edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.language.ngram

Class DynamicTrigramModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.language.ngram.DynamicTrigramModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LanguageModel, Configurable

    public class DynamicTrigramModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements LanguageModel
    3-gram language model that can change its content at runtime.
